title: 96/404/EC: Commission Decision of 21 June 1996 repealing Decision 91/56/EEC concerning certain protection measures relating to contagious bovine pleuropneumonia in Italy (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 21 June 1996 repealing Decision 91/56/EEC concerning certain protection measures relating to contagious bovine pleuropneumonia in Italy (Text with EEA relevance) (96/404/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: This Decision shall apply from 1 July 1996.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 21 June 1996.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 224, 18. 8. 1990, p. 29.
(2) OJ No L 62, 15. 3. 1993, p. 49.
(3) OJ No L 35, 7. 2. 1991, p. 29.
